Articles.Content:
Hello,

Here is the 6th revision of my Intrepid Class Interplanetary Ship. It has a little over 9km of d/v and around 12 km of d/v with a drop tank. In the album, I also included a couple of shots from a recent trip to Eeloo and back.

The following mods are required:

KAS, Infernal Robotics, and Procedural Fairings.

KAS is used for adding struts to stabilize the drop tank. Infernal Robotics is used for spreading out the engine pods. Procedural Fairings is used for the fairings at launch time.

With the exception of the optional drop tank, the ship is fully re-usable.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Best Regards,

Brian

Edited September 25, 2014 by reifsnyderb
